column2: Oh gods another one? Didn't those twins just get here? Leave me alone and let me work.
The gods hate people like you.
Why, kid? I don't want this trash.
Ok ok... You did good with this one.
Huh... You managed to put a smile on my old face... Thanks kid.
Why did you come all the way out here to talk to me?$I don't have time for you.
column3: Seriously? You have to really go out of your way to talk to me, and I don't even want to.
